item.title: Idea of a command, need help tho
item.dc:creator: @huggies huggies
item.description:
@huggies wrote:

Hey I got an idea of making a command for admins only. Like if you type ::coords it will tell you the current coords your standing at. I don’t know if this is possible, but it would be nice.

I got this so far:

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("coords") && (playerRights >= 2)) 
{
(What should I add here?)
}

I searched on coord and looked through all 4 pages, no result that helped me tho.

Read full topic
